channel.title: PI Deathlypvpz Help
channel.description:
Hello. I got some questions about PI (Deathlypvpz V4)
1.) When i level Hunter it shows an anvil in the Interface. How can i change it to the Hunter one?
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/23qxic5.png[/img]
2.) How can i change the color of the Client? (making the frame blue for example)
3.) How can i change the things in quest tab? Want to add: Players Online, Loyalty Points, KDR..
Please help

item.title: PI Deathlypvpz Help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Keep it to one topic please.

Read full topic
